tool_description: Get the SSL certificate details of any public host. The binding of the certificate should be on port 443
title: Certficate

api_list.name: getCertDetails
api_list.description: Get the certificate details of a domain.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certficate.p.rapidapi.com/certificate/details/{domainname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certficate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
